thread.title: Stonebridge expected to make a killing in Seattle hotel sale
thread.title_full: Stonebridge expected to make a killing in Seattle hotel sale

author: Ben Miller
title: Stonebridge expected to make a killing in Seattle hotel sale
text: Stonebridge expected to make a killing in Seattle hotel sale Jul 10, 2015, 7:17am MDT Stonebridge Cos. of Denver paid $63 million for the Seattle Hilton Hotel in 2012. It's upâ€¦ more Three years ago, Colorado hotel developer Stonebridge Cos . paid $63 million for a Seattle Hilton hotel. It's now for sale and is expected to sell for nearly twice that amount. The Puget Sound Business Journal reports there's a hotel selling spree going on in Seattle right now, and Stonebridge is expected to capitalize. Home of the Day
